meta.title: Default NPC Dialogue (After First Conversation)
meta.notes: Each NPC/cutscene can have a default set. Used after the 'once' dialogue has already been played.

hel_meadhall.speaker: Hel
lines: Do not grow comfortable. Comfort rots first.

loki_room.speaker: Loki
lines: Back again, {name}? Good. I was starting to miss the sound of bad decisions.
If you’re here for praise, try somewhere holy. This is Dreadheim.
Go on—prove you didn’t survive by accident.

cutscene_dreadheim_scene1.speaker: Loki
lines: Dreadheim doesn’t repeat itself for free.
